DataElement.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Preference for Details of Information About Diagnosis and Treatment 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation about their loved one's preference for how much detail they want about diagnosis and treatment, using a 3 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Preference for Details of Information About Diagnosis and Treatment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care._A question about a person's preference for details of information about the patient's diagnosis and treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Caregiver Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Concepts.definition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Property.preferredName: Preference for Details of Information About Diagnosis and Treatment
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's preference for details of information about the patient's diagnosis and treatment.

Concepts.longName: Preference for Details of Information About Diagnosis and Treatment
Concepts.definition: A question about a person's preference for details of information about the patient's diagnosis and treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard with three text responses related to the amount of detail an individual wants to hear about their diagnosis and treatment.

PermissibleValues.value: I want to hear as many details as possible in all situations relating to my cancer and its treatment
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer to Hear as Many Details as Possible

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer to Hear as Many Details as Possible
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether a person would prefer to hear as many details as possible.

Concepts.longName: Prefer to Hear as Many Details as Possible
Concepts.definition: A question about whether a person would prefer to hear as many details as possible.

PermissibleValues.value: I want to hear details only in certain situations, such as when tests are abnormal or when treatment decisions need to be made
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer to Hear Details in Certain Situations

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer to Hear Details in Certain Situations
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether a person would prefer to hear details only in certain circumstances.

Concepts.longName: Prefer to Hear Details in Certain Situations
Concepts.definition: A question about whether a person would prefer to hear details only in certain circumstances.

PermissibleValues.value: I prefer not to hear a lot of details
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Prefer Not to Hear a Lot of Details

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Prefer Not to Hear a Lot of Details
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether a person would prefer not to hear a lot of details.

Concepts.longName: Prefer Not to Hear a Lot of Details
Concepts.definition: A question about whether a person would prefer not to hear a lot of details.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14
